      • hashCheck

        private boolean hashCheck(MachineState state,
                int depth)
        Check if a state has been seen further up in the tree and adds it if not.
        Parameters:
        state - MachineState
        depth - Depth value in the game tree (counting backwards)
        Returns:
        True if the state was already added in a more favorable position
